text: (nabiyē!) sǣma dūtayekuma (tama janatāvaṭa) pæhædiliva vivaraṇaya kara pavasanu piṇisa, ovunovungē janatāvagē bhāṣāvan maginma (dēśanā karana men) api ovunva yævvemu. (ema dūtayin kopamaṇa utsāha dærūvada, ovun karana pav pin valaṭa sarilana sē) allāh adahas kaḷa ayava væradi mārgayehi athæra damannēya. ohu kæmati vana (dæhæmi kriyāvan karannan)va ṛju mārgayehi ætuḷu karannēya. ohu (siyallaṭama) balasampannayeku hā gnānavantayeku vaśayen siṭinnēya
